name: places/ChIJJz5gTwBZwokRygob8kuv800
adrFormatAddress: 501 5th Ave #607, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: Apple Repair Club is a vital resource for the repair of perfectly viable older Apple computers and devices. Apple has always promoted planned obsolescence, forcing its customers to [needlessly] buy new equipment. By deeming certain computers as 'vintage,' Apple makes getting repairs and customer support for older devices more difficult. In working with ARP, make sure to discuss your repair options and negotiate the terms of your follow-up customer support. Their work and customer support are very good.

originalText.text:
Wish I knew about this place sooner. I had to get a MacBook screen replaced. Had been putting it off because Apple wanted almost $1,000. (for those of us silly enough to not purchase AppleCare)

Puru is amazing. Very honest and upfront about pricing. Less than half the price of going to Apple, and I'm highly satisfied with his work and turnaround time.

originalText.text: Came here with the hope of having my MacBook Pro (2017) fixed from water damage. Unfortunately, the logic board could not be repaired. The owner was incredibly generous. He refunded me the full amount ($579 + tax) for not being able to revive my laptop. Process took about a week. Very honest and efficient service. Definitely recommend for Apple product repairs!

text.text: Came here with the hope of having my MacBook Pro (2017) fixed from water damage. Unfortunately, the logic board could not be repaired. The owner was incredibly generous. He refunded me the full amount ($579 + tax) for not being able to revive my laptop. Process took about a week. Very honest and efficient service. Definitely recommend for Apple product repairs!

originalText.text: I had an amazing experience with Puru and the Apple Repair Club.  I attempted to change the battery in my 2017 13" MacBook Pro and almost destroyed the laptop in the process.  Lesson: don't do this! Bring it to Puru before you do any work, he is amazing and will take care of you for a very reasonable price.  You will get much better support here for your Apple computer than at one of the larger repair shops which I have also used. I should also add he has a really nice selection of refurnished apple laptops for sale, I plan to buy my next one through him.  Highly recommended, super convenient location, amazing guy, great prices, what more can you ask for?!

originalText.text:
Excellent experience. I was skeptical coming in but Puru was an amazing help. My Macbook Pro from 2012 --- i know; it's old --- is working fine but I noticed the fan has higher activity than usual. Puru helped identify the cause & suggested I contact the Software that was causing the CPU drainage.

He got my old MacBook to keep going for another year or 2 & I'm forever grateful. He was also very straightforward about the repair cost & gave me a few suggestions weighing the choice between fixing it or getting a new laptop

Will definitely be back when I need a new Macbook in a few years. If you don't feel like throwing away your computer every few years & want to make use of the current ones as long as possible. I highly recommend bringing it in for Puru to look at.
